body:
## Expected Behavior
When the result is not ready, PollWorkflowExecutionUpdate should return empty response instead of returning DeadlineExceededError. The behavior should be the same as PollWorkflowTaskQueue/PollActivityTaskQueue. 

## Actual Behavior
PollWorkflowExecutionUpdate returns DeadlineExceededError.
title: PollWorkflowExecutionUpdate should return empty response instead of DeadlineExceededError
